title: 3 Bed Apartment in Lakeview FURNISHED Flexible and Newly Renovated 9/1
posting_body: A fully renovated FULLY FURNISHED 3 Bedroom, 1 Full Bath, Dining Room, Living Room, Full Kitchen, Outside deck, apartment in the heart of Lakeview is now available!
Hardwood floors, New Central AC/furnace installed, access to basement for (FREE) washer/dryer use.
Beautiful porch, backyard with newly installed pavers that is fenced in with a garden.
Covered Garage spot in backyard available at additional cost, please ask for details.
We can be flexible with the furniture included, if for some reason you didn't want any of it, or just some of it we could help accommodate that.
The white quartz countertops are all brand new and a wonderful upgrade from the black slate counter that was there before.
The place was recently repainted, refurnished, re-floored hardwood floors installed and is as beautiful as ever.
All furniture and kitchen appliances, towels, fresh linens, bathroom amenities provided.
Friendly building, with quiet tenants who live and work full time in both other units.
I have been living in the same building since 2005 and still love it!
I pride myself on being a prompt responsive landlord who can address any issues in a timely manner.
Since I live in the same building, it makes it very easy and convenient.
Don't miss out on a chance to fully enjoy your visit to Chicago in a beautiful building in an awesome and convenient neighborhood!
The apartment is just a 1 MINUTE WALK to the Belmont Red/Brown/Purple Line el Station.
Ten minute walk to Lake Michigan or Wrigley Field.
Hundreds of restaurants, bars, theaters, concert venues and exciting places to visit and see just right outside the door!
Lakeview/Wrigleyville is a very fun and desirable neighborhood to live in and visit.
Fletcher street is a very quiet street very close to lots of action, but you would never know it, which is part of the street of Fletcher's charm.
Here are a couple links for a brief video tour.
Please know these were made in 2020 when the place was last available and we have replaced ALL the countertops in the kitchen to a much nicer white quartz, which you can see in the photos.
Please email or text me at 847-997-10ninety seven with questions.
